answer:
If you are concerned about an elderly neighbor in Nottingham who seems confused and isn't eating properly, you can report adult safeguarding concerns to the Nottingham City Council. **Contact the Health and Care Point at 0115 876 3330** to make a safeguarding referral. 

Before making the referral, it is advisable to try and get consent from the adult at risk if possible. However, you can still make a referral without consent if necessary. Keep a written record of your observations and any conversations, as this may be useful when making the referral. 

For more detailed guidance, you can refer to the Nottingham City and Nottinghamshire Adult Safeguarding Procedures available online at [Nottingham City Safeguarding Adults Board](http://psnc.org.uk/nottinghamshire-lpc/wp-content/uploads/sites/21/2014/09/Safeguarding-Guidance-Jan-2017.pdf).
